description: Defines styling options for a specific reality data resource.

nonLocatable.description: If true, reality data will not be drawn when using Viewport.readPixels

transparency.description: Transparency in the range [0.0, 1.0] where 0 indicates fully opaque and 1 indicates fully transparent.

displayProps.description: Settings that control how a reality model - whether a ContextRealityModel or a persistent reality Model - is displayed within a Viewport.

overrideColorRatio.description: If the reality model's color is overridden with another color, a ratio in the range [0.0, 1.0] with which to mix the two colors together. A ratio of 0 uses only the reality model's color, a ratio of 1 uses only the override color, and a ratio of 0.5 mixes the two colors equally.

pointCloud.description: Settings that control how a point cloud reality model is displayed within a Viewport.

shape.description: The shape drawn for each point in the cloud.

sizeMode.description: Specifies how the sizes of the individual points within a point cloud are computed. Pixel: Each point is an exact number of pixels in diameter. Voxel: Each point is the size of a 'voxel' in meters

pixelSettings.description: Settings that control how points are displayed when 'sizeMode' is 'pixel'.

size.description: The radius of each point in pixels The maximum size will vary based on the graphics hardware in use, but typically is limited to 32 or 64 pixels.

voxelSettings.description: Settings that control how points are displayed when 'sizeMode' is 'voxel'.

scale.description: Scale factor applied to the size of each point.

minPixelsPerVoxel.description: Minimum radius of each point in pixels.

maxPixelsPerVoxel.description: Maximum radius of each point in pixels.

eyeDome.description: Settings that control the Eye Dome Lighting (EDL) effect applied to a point cloud.

mode.description: Off: EDL is not calculated. On: EDL is calculated using a single pass. Full: EDL is calculated with full algorithm including optional filtering.

strength.description: Increasing this value increases contrast on slopes and edges.

radius.description: Increase the thickness of contours from eye dome lighting.

filter.description: Flag for whether or not to apply filtering pass in the Eye Dome Lighting (EDL) effect. It only applies if edlMode is 'full'.

mixWts1.description: Weighting value in the range [0.0, 1.0] to apply to the full image when combining it with the half and quarter sized ones.

mixWts2.description: Weighting value in the range [0.0, 1.0] to apply to the half sized image when combining it with the full and quarter sized ones.

mixWts4.description: Weighting value in the range [0.0, 1.0] to apply to the quarter sized image when combining it with the full and half sized one.
